meanings.definition: A machine for making photographic copies of documents.
meanings.sent1: The photostat quickly copied the important papers.
meanings.sent2: The office had a photostat to duplicate legal documents.
meanings.sent3: The photostat machine decided to take a break after copying all day.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like a photostat, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The photostat hummed as it reproduced the old photograph.

meanings.definition: To make a photographic copy of a document using a photostat machine.
meanings.sent1: She will photostat the contract for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: Please photostat this report for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: He photostatted his face just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Their love was so strong, it seemed to photostat their smiles.
meanings.sent5: The photostat process is simple and efficient for copying documents.
